message.content:
{
  "id": "132786",
  "title": "Bug 132786 - Value2 not cleaned after converting operator from BETWEEN to EQUAL in highlight rule",
  "description": "When setting a highlight rule to color blue for values between 1 and 3, the value of Value2 is not cleaned after converting the operator from BETWEEN to EQUAL in the highlight rule.",
  "OB": "The value of Value2 should be cleaned after converting the operator from BETWEEN to EQUAL in the highlight rule.",
  "EB": "The value of Value2 is not cleaned after converting the operator from BETWEEN to EQUAL in the highlight rule. The highlight expression still contains value1 as 1 and value2 as 3.",
  "SR": "To reproduce the issue:\n1. Insert a data.\n2. Set a highlight rule in the Property Editor.\n3. Save the report.\n4. Modify the highlight rule and change it to '1 equal 1' with the color blue.\n5. Save the report again."
}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '132786', 'title': 'Bug 132786Value2 should be cleaned after convert operator from between to equal in highlight rule.', 'description': '2 between 1 and 3, color blue.3. Description:Value2 should be cleaned after convert operator from between to equal in highlight rule.Steps to reproduce:1. Save the report, see generated xml source.Expected result:In xml source, value2 should be cleaned in highlight expression.Actual result:In xml source, value1 is 1 and value2 is 3. ', 'SR': 'Insert a data.2. Set highlight rule in Property Editor. Save the report4. Modify highlight rule, change to 1 equal 1, color blue.5. '}
